1539930.name: VRNOID Demo
1539930.description:
VRnoid is an action-sport game that brings you the joy of playing Air Hockey with breaking bricks mechanics.

It also reminds some of the old-school retro arcade games.
Such a combination of game styles with modern ideas turnout into a wonderful VR game with various modes.

Features
· Responsive physics gameplay
· Multiple Arcade levels with various bonuses
· Unique Boss fights
· In-game VR level editor
· Compete or Team up with mouse player, in Pong and Arcade modes
· Leaderboard to check the personal score


The game is still in development, you will see improved graphics, sound, and gameplay soon!
1539930.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
